'''MEL''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]].<ref name=VT39>{{VT|39a}}, p. 10</ref>

==Derivatives==
*[[Quenya]]: ''[[méla]]''<ref name=VT39/>
*[[Telerin]] ''[[māla]]''<ref name=VT39/>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
In the ''Etymologies'' appears the root '''MEL-''', signifying "love (as friend)". Amongs its derivatives are:
*Quenya ''melin'' ("dear"), ''[[melme]]'' ("love")
*Noldorin ''[[mellon]]'' ("friend")<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 372</ref>
